summary: Ringo comes to a Mexican village, searching for his brother from whom he has heard no news. He comes with a sheriff who immediately has work on his hands, as those who get killed are certainly too many.
cast: Jean Louis|Omero Gargano|Lucia Bomez|Giovanni Ivan Scratuglia|Mickey Hargitay|Gualtiero Rispoli|Armando Carini|Any Cerreto|Bob Villar|Mario Dardanelli|Altiero Di Giovanni|Augusto Funari
title: Giunse Ringo e... fu tempo di massacro
